protein.specific_function: Transfers mannosyl residues to the hydroxyl group of serine or threonine residues. Coexpression of both POMT1 and POMT2 is necessary for enzyme activity, expression of either POMT1 or POMT2 alone is insufficient.

reference.reference_text: Willer T, Amselgruber W, Deutzmann R, Strahl S: Characterization of POMT2, a novel member of the PMT protein O-mannosyltransferase family specifically localized to the acrosome of mammalian spermatids. Glycobiology. 2002 Nov;12(11):771-83.
